meanings.sent1: She bought spermicides to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: The spermicides were effective in stopping sperm.
meanings.sent3: The spermicides were like tiny soldiers fighting off the sperm invaders.
meanings.sent4: The spermicides acted like a fortress, blocking the path of the sperm.
meanings.sent5: The spermicides worked like a shield, protecting against unwanted pregnancies.

meanings.definition: Products used to prevent pregnancy by killing sperm.
meanings.sent1: They relied on spermicides for birth control.
meanings.sent2: The store sold various types of spermicides.
meanings.sent3: The spermicides were like secret agents on a mission to stop sperm.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was a treasure trove of spermicides, ready for action.
meanings.sent5: The spermicides were the heroes in the battle against unplanned parenthood.

meanings.sent1: The doctors recommended using spermicides to prevent conception.
meanings.sent2: The spermicides were effective at neutralizing sperm cells.
meanings.sent3: The spermicides were like the cleaners, wiping out any trace of sperm.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like spermicides, erasing any chance of fertilization.
meanings.sent5: The spermicides were like the bouncers, kicking out any unwanted sperm guests.
